Reference

AEC functions

Functions used in the preparation of the Annual Epidemiological Commentary

aec_age_sex_plot()

Plot rates by age and sex structure, faceted by financial year.

aec_age_trend_pc()

Graph trend in percentage of cases by age group

aec_age_trend_rate()

Graph trend in rate of cases by age and sex

aec_age_trend_rate_bar()

aec_age_trend_rate

aec_age_trend_rate_pc_change()

aec_age_trend_rate_pc_change

aec_create_folder_structure()

Set up empty folders for Annual publication

aec_ec_source_plot()

Plot the most likely primary focus for E. coli bacteraemia by time to onset

aec_inpatient()

Determine whether record is from an acute trust inpatient for AEC

aec_subregion_plot()

Plot rates by NHS subregion

aec_tto_plot()

AEC time to onset plot

ann_tab_ccg_names()

Format CCG names for printing in the annual tables.

ann_tab_long()

Create long annual tables from line listing data

ann_tab_onset_annual()

ann_tab_onset_annual

ann_tab_onset_qtrly()

ann_tab_onset_qtrly

ann_tab_pir_org_type()

Format pir org type for annual tables

Monthly output functions

Functions used in preparation of monthly outputs

mo_curr_months()

Create months for monthly outputs

mo_gnabsi_table()

Monthly table for Gram-negative blood stream infection data

mo_next_pub_date()

Returns the next publication date of the monthly outputs.

mo_prior_hc_table()

mo_prior_hc_table

mo_pub_date()

Nicely formats date of publication for monthly data

mo_std_table()

Monthly CCG table

mo_tab_long()

mo_tab_long

function to create text objects for monthly factsheets

mf_fig1_fun()

Monthly factsheet figure 1 function

mf_lag_trend()

lag mf trend data

mf_trend_data

Data for monthly factsheet figure 1 function

Date functions

Functions used to manipulate dates and time periods into those used in routine outputs

cyear_to_cq()

Cyear to long calendar quarter

cyear_to_fyear()

Convert calendar year to financial year

date_end_period()

Get the string of the first date in a period

date_start_period()

Get the string of the first date in a period

date_to_cmonth()

date_to_cmonth

date_to_fmonth()

date_to_fmonth

date_to_fq()

date_to_fq

date_to_fyear()

date_to_fyear

days_in_cy()

Get the number of days in a calendar year

days_in_fmonth()

Calculates number of days in a financial month.

days_in_fq()

Get the number of days in the quarter of a financial year

days_in_fy()

Get the number of days in a financial year

fq_long()

Format date into long quarter.

fq_short()

Format date into short text financial quarter.

fq_short_to_date()

fq_short_to_date

fq_to_cq()

Convert financial year quarters to calendar year quarters

fq_to_fyear()

Convert financial quarter to six-character financial year

fy_long()

Format date into long text financial year.

fy_long_short()

Format fy_long into short financial year.

fy_short()

Format date into short text financial year.

fy_six()

Create six character financial year from date

fy_six_to_long()

Format date into long text financial year.

fyear_to_cyear()

Convert financial year to calendar year

fyear_to_fq()

Fyear to long financial quarter

ordered_fin_qtr()

Create factor variable from financial quarter

ordered_m_y()

Add ordered month and calendar year to a data frame
